scripts.deploy-dev: dotenv cross-var aws s3 sync build/ s3://%DEV_S3_BUCKET% --delete
scripts.deploy-staging: dotenv cross-var aws s3 sync build/ s3://%STAGING_S3_BUCKET% --delete
scripts.deploy-prod: dotenv cross-var aws s3 sync build/ s3://%PROD_S3_BUCKET% --delete
scripts.invalidate-cache-dev: aws configure set preview.cloudfront true && dotenv cross-var aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id %DEV_CLOUDFRONT_ID% --paths '/*'
scripts.invalidate-cache-staging: aws configure set preview.cloudfront true && dotenv cross-var aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id %STAGING_CLOUDFRONT_ID% --paths '/*'
scripts.invalidate-cache-prod: aws configure set preview.cloudfront true && dotenv cross-var aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id %PROD_CLOUDFRONT_ID% --paths '/*'
